author: n3tsurge
description: This capability involves establishing the ability to find a file by its path within a system or network. This includes implementing mechanisms to locate files based on their directory structure and file names, ensuring that all files can be efficiently accessed and managed. It is essential for maintaining data integrity, facilitating quick access to necessary files, and enhancing overall operational efficiency by providing visibility into file locations within the organization.

requirements.description: Staff must be trained and qualified to perform this capability effectively.
Documented procedures and playbooks must be available for executing this capability.
File system access and forensic tools for file analysis and manipulation.

title: Establish Ability to Find File by Path

references.name: NIST SP 800-61 Rev. 2: Incident Response Preparation
SANS: Incident Response Team Development and Preparation
